thread.title: Police push for power to shoot terrorists earlier | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Police push for power to shoot terrorists earlier | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Police push for power to shoot terrorists earlier | Daily Mail Online
text: Top police pushing for power to shoot terrorists sooner in hostage situations following Lindt Cafe siege Police are pushing for ability to shoot terrorists earlier during hostage situations It comes amid talk of a security shakeup following the Sydney Siege inquest Coroner's report into 2014 attack will recommend security overhaul in Australia It will propose creation of new national security portfolio headed by one minister NSW coroner Michael Barnes will recommend changes in how police train, use weapons and interact with other agencies Published: 00:37 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 00:37 GMT, 7 February 2017 526 shares
